entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 11:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: -15.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -18.7°C
Wind: NNW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
